title: Nobody knows what relic shield does
body:
Every game my team doesn't let me last hit a couple minions, they think I'm stealing from them even when I explain how the item works...
Please riot make a support PSA

What if relic shield gave you gold when you **receive** some damage from champions?
This way champions buying it would have another incentive to trade/engage/tank, which is usually what those champions want to do to be active in lane anyway.
(if the enemy is ignoring you in order to not give you gold, then you are probably going to get an easily won lane from repeated free trades/engages)
A system like {{item:3303}} 's lockout would prevent this item from being abused in other lanes.

Hmm... it's an interesting thought. I don't hate way that you're thinking, but I don't love *that* particular suggestion. 

I do think something more inventive would be great. Soft prediction, in addition to the other problems in this thread, relic shield is going to look even worse when winion stats go away and wave management becomes important again. Relic is going to look really bad when your marksmen is trying to freeze a wave.
Riot could always bring back Globe of Trust from Black Market Brawlers, but they've already made clear their stance on shield spam in the botlane so it's unlikely.

Killing minions disables the shrine counter for a while.

There's a very simple reason why mid-game people don't want to give Relic users CS.
It takes about 3~seconds for a support to auto attack 4 minions, and usually at mid game, someone can clear a wave in 1~ second.

Riot needs to find a way for supports to do the same with relic shield - ie, one auto attack used all 4 stacks.

It's not a problem with players, but a problem with design.
